fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives:
Harmonisierung/Schaffung eines EU-Binnenmarktes für digitale Güter,
